src:
PB PRSI Terima Tantangan CdM Indonesia di SEA Games 2019
05 Nov 2019, 20:31 by Anggi Tiar


PB PRSI Terima Tantangan CdM Indonesia di SEA Games 2019

KBRN, Jakarta : Ketua Umum PB PRSI, Anindya Novyan Bakrie siap menerima tantangan yang diberikan oleh CdM Indonesia di SEA Games 2019, Harry Warganegara. 
Harry sendiri memberikan tantangan kepada Timnas Renang Indonesia untuk meraih enam emas pada ajang SEA Games 2019 di Manila, Filipina. Padahal, sebelumnya PB PRSI hanya mematok target empat emas pada pesta olahraga multievent dua tahunan tersebut. 
Akan tetapi, Anindya optimis Timnas Renang Indonesia bisa mewujudkan tantangan tersebut. Menyusul, persiapan maksimal yang telah dilakukan. Bahkan target enam emas yang diminta CdM bakal menjadi prioritas utamanya. 
"Tantangan adalah tantangan, tentu membawa motivasi untuk kita.  Kalau dibilang tantangan, ya namanya juga tantangan. Kalau bisa targetnya sama atau kalau bisa lebih, seperti yang Pak Menpora (Zainudin Amali) dan CdM targetkan. Kita akan coba, para atlet kita beri persiapan yang terbaik baik di fisik maupun moral," tutur Anin. 
Sebagai informasi, pada SEA Games 2019 Filipina, Tim Akuatik Indonesia akan mengikuti empat nomor yakni renang, polo air, loncat indah dan renang perairan terbuka.
text:
PB PRSI Accepts the Indonesian CDM Challenge at the 2019 SEA Games
05 Nov 2019, 20:31 by Anggi Tiar


PB PRSI Accepts the Indonesian CDM Challenge at the 2019 SEA Games

KBRN, Jakarta: PB PRSI Chairperson Anindya Novyan Bakrie is ready to accept the challenges posed by CdM Indonesia at the 2019 SEA Games, Harry Citizen.
Harry himself gave a challenge to the Indonesian Swimming National Team to win six gold at the 2019 SEA Games in Manila, Philippines. In fact, previously PB PRSI only set a target of four gold at the biennial multi-event sports party.
However, Anindya is optimistic that the Indonesian Swimming National Team can realize these challenges. Following, the maximum preparation has been done. Even the six gold target that CdM requested will be its top priority.
"The challenge is a challenge, of course it brings motivation for us. If you say that the challenge, the name is also a challenge. If you can target the same or if you can more, like what the Minister of Youth and Sports (Zainudin Amali) and CdM are targeting. We will try, our athletes will prepare the best both physically and morally, "said Anin.
For information, at the 2019 SEA Games in the Philippines, the Indonesian Aquatic Team will follow four numbers namely swimming, water polo, beautiful jumping and open water swimming.
